Officine Innesto

Grafting Technologies

Welcome to Officine Innesto

Officine Innesto is an innovative company that deals with design and technology. We connect the physical with the digital world. We deal with education, workshops and physical prototyping.

Features

We work as consultancy, with public and private institutions, developing projects in which technology is the main center. We develop prototypes, training courses, events related to the world of technology and design.

PHYSICAL COMPUTING AND FAST PROTOTYPING

Using open source hardware and software and rapid prototyping machines we help you making your ideas happen

WORKSHOPS AND COURSES

We want to share our knowledge and for this we organize workshops and courses on the topics we deal with.

R&D AND CONSULTANCY

We research carefully and develop the best solutions based on your requirements

Projects

We have been investing on different topics, around the conversation between man and machine. Many different landscapes in the background, such as the home environment, the working place, the prototyping/production domain, and STEM/STEAM education.

DigifabTuring

FablabForKids

Torino Mini Maker Faire

Casa Jasmina

FabLabTorino

Rural Hack

Our Blog...

As you can understand Officine Innesto is a containter of many different things, the horyzontal and bottom-up community of Fablab Torino or the R&D experimental Home of Casa Jasmina, the agro-educational tech-savvy educational experience of Ruralhack (shared with pals @RuralHub) or the STEAM formats of FablabForKids. All of this site / experiences have their very own blogs and social. Not expect much from our new-born blog, most of the time put apart by other (stronger?) needs. That is, the shoemaker's children go barefoot
